data.empty:
[u]Skill Slot[/u]


Empty skill slot. Acquire Skill Scrolls to get new skills.
data.manablast:
[u]Mana Blast[/u]
4mp

Fire a bolt of pure magic, dealing 3 damage to target enemy in line of sight
data.shield:
[u]Shield[/u]
3mp

Gain a magic shield that absorbs 6 hp of damage. Decays by 1 if not hit.
data.knightleap:
[u]Knight's Leap[/u]
2mp

Channel the mystic power of the Knights of Chess to teleport a short distance.
data.manacharge:
[u]Mana Charge[/u]
Passive

Build up charge for each enemy killed, gaining 1 mp at 3 charges.
data.soulsiphon:
[u]Soul Siphon[/u]
Passive

Harvest the magical energies of enemies killed, gaining temporary mana.
